verses.roman:
ihāṅ rāmacandra khāna sevake ājñā dila
gosāñi yāhāṅ vasilā, tāra māṭī khodāila

synonyms: ihāṅ—here; rāmacandra khāna—Rāmacandra Khān; sevake—to the servant; ājñā dila—ordered; gosāñi—Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; yāhāṅ—where; vasilā—sat down; tāra—of that place; māṭī—earth; khodāila—caused to dig.
translation: Rāmacandra Khān ordered the servant to dig up the dirt in the place where Nityānanda Prabhu had sat.
